disabled.description: Render the component in a disabled state

htmlSize.description: Sets the native HTML size attribute.

inputRef.description: A ref that points to the input element

keepCharPositions.description: When `true`, adding or deleting characters will not affect the position of existing characters.

mask (\\*).description: Used to define how to block user input.

showMask.description: When the input value is empty, the mask is displayed as a placeholder instead of a regular placeholder.
